attributes.action: stop immigrants from coming to the UK and taking all of our jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stops the hundreds of thousands coming into the UK and taking the jobs. we go to college, work hard and when we finaly leave we are told that there are no jobs are available. more that likely because 2/3 of people on construction sites are immigrants.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
